title: ITT 2015 - Chad Fowler - The Wunderlist 3 Story
description: Chad Fowler recounts the pains and joys of migration. This talks has its bases on the following questions: How do you maintain a radically heterogeneous system with a small group of developers? How do you monitor a fleet of disparate microservices? How do you make it perform acceptably? How does it change the way you think about deployment?
